Articles.Content: Whenever I scroll down and see who is online there is something that bugs me. Next to the clearly visible text saying, "Who's Online" there is completely unreadable grey text against a blue background. I'm not sure if it's only a problem for light theme but I wouldn't understand why it would be any different in dark mode. It is supposed to say how many people are online.
Temporary measure: can you click-drag to highlight it?
